data.description:
A New VR Puzzle Game!

Assemble the Pipes as fast as you can to Stop the Water Leak.

From the creators of Crazy Kung Fu comes another exciting VR experience focused on skill and speed. Pipe Dream Co is a spatial puzzle game that challenges your mind to save water in as few moves as possible. Place the pipes strategically and stop the flow before the clock runs out!

As you build your skills, you’ll be given promotions to bigger and more complex jobs with new pipes and obstacles. Unlock new game modes with each new level. 

Features:
- 30 challenging water puzzle jobs!
- Wacky pipe modifiers: fast, slow, dirty… wormhole??
- Night game mode: do the jobs… with a flashlight!
- Music helps you stay in the flow while crushing the gush!

Save Water, Save the World!

changelog.change_log:
Thanks everyone for your continued support! As you may have noticed we're going through a sequence of big updates recently whilst going through a lot of community feedback.
This update is mostly focused around the overall visual quality of the game, as well as a few improvements and changes to gameplay. Enjoy!

Graphics:
- Improved all water quality
- Improved surrounding scenery, it also changes as you progress through the ranks
- Slightly updated the puzzle grid to be more visually appealing
- New pipe model/textures so they feel more lively!
- Redesigned clouds plain
- New water end point, so it's clearer and more interesting where the water needs to go. They are color coded AND have text that says what they are for ("Water Collection" on blue, Waste Collection" on yellow).

Gameplay:
- CHALLENGE BADGES added to each level. Complete each task to earn 3 badges per level.

Menu:
- Update Menu UI for end of levels. Now you'll see the badges you've earned with your level stats. And will be able to start the next level (if unlocked) immediately, play the current level again or return to the main menu.
- Menu follows your head less aggressively now, so you can look around a fair amount and if you look too far away from the menu only then will it return to your view.
- Updated Clipboard graphics, UI is more rounded and smooth.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed bug where if you dropped a block, it would return to the dispender and get...blocked?
- Fixed issue where music would'nt loop in some instances.

Thank you everyone for your continued support. Here's a fairly big update with a lot of quality of life improvements: 

- Puzzle grid can now be rotated horizontally. Playing seated is much easier now!
- Pipes can now be put back into the dispensers.
- Pipes will return to the dispensers if dropped!
- Xmas themed props have been removed (somehow they kept coming back, like a neverending Xmas).
- Text overhaul! No more pixelation, so text is always crisp and much easier to read now.
- Any held pipes will be destroyed at the end of a level (no more carrying pipes over between levels, though that made for a good hack I admit)

- Clipboard now follows player foward position until selection has been made
- New level success ending (blue floating droplets + win sound cue)
- New level fail ending (grey floating droplets + fail sound cue)
- To move the puzzle grid hold down (A) instead of TRIGGER.
- Intro scene pipe sandbox has been moved to be more visible at first, and clearer as to what it's puprose is.
- Grip system has been rebuilt to be more reliable at speed, and you can throw pipes more accuractly now (but why would you throw them...)
- Fixed issue where music wouldn't loop correctly in some levels
- Fixed issue where water wouldn't teleport to correct location in Jobs 19+
- Fixed issue where rank 4 wouldn't unlock correctly in some instances.
- Fixed issue where the yellow end cube could be grabbed on Jobs 19+
